page.title: 17LOCAL CUSTOMS, DUNDEE
page.content:
Dundee has many traditions and customs peculiar to the city:
{MAY DAY:}On May Day in some areas of Dundee, a girl aged 13 dresses up as a queen with a bunch of paper flowers and lots of little girls dress up as princesses.The queen holds a maypole and the princesses hold ropes coming out from it.They all go through the streets on a float. { {BEFORE A WEDDING : }A week or two before a wedding, the bride or groom is dressed up in ridiculous clothes and is processed to a public place.He or she is then tied to a lamppost and is left standing there for everybody to see and laugh at.After that, confetti and other such things are thrown over them as a token of good wishes for the future.
